snippet.title: The Great Gaias Official Trailer HD
snippet.description:
A mysterious contract from the royal family sparks the interest of an organized band of sellswords. What seems like a normal job quickly spirals into a whirlwind of betrayal and tragedy, thrusting a young rogue and his unlikely companions into the middle of an ancient prophecy.

As the Children of Light fight their way across the land and towards their destiny, who will you choose to lead your party to victory over the forces of evil... or not?

The Great Gaias goes on pre-sale at PAX East on April 5th.

Visit us at http://www.horizonsend.com
http://store.steampowered.com/app/818610/The_Great_Gaias/
